name: 5 Day Inca Trail Trek
description:
During this hike, you will have more time to "take it easy" and explore everything the Inca Trail has to offer (Inca Sites, flora, bird-watching etc.). You will camp in places behind the normal campsites, in more private are where fewer people.

This trek consists of 4 days of hiking on the Inca Trail and accommodations on the 4th day in a hostel in Aguas Calientes. This is a great option for families with children or anyone who would like to experience the Inca trail. Also, this hike will allow you to see Machu Picchu twice! The first time as we hike into Machu Picchu as the sun is setting, and on the following day This tour is a great option for people who would enjoy the hotel option on the final day.
